title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Womens Emergency Committee
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People     Womens Emergency Committee                Womens Emergency Committee and the Lost Year         Flyer produced by the WEC.   In the fall of 1958, the Women's Emergency Committee to Open Our Schools worked to reopen the city's high schools under the district's desegregation plan. Click here for more information about this organization and the Lost Year.  Â       Women's Emergency Committee Roster For 40 years the membership of the WEC remained secret. In 1998, former members compiled a list from individual membership cards and released it to the public as a tribute to all the women who joined. Click here to see a list of the members. Please email us with updates to the list. Note that many of the women are listed by their married names, because that is how they listed themselves on the membership cards.
